metadata.Title: CVE-2021-25287 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Pillow before 8.2.0. There is an out-of-bounds read in J2kDecode, in j2ku_graya_la.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.4
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.0.0-4ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-4ubuntu0.4').
pillow-python2 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
